Class HUDmanager

java.lang.Object
tage.HUDmanager
public class HUDmanager extends Object
Manages up to two HUD strings, implemented as GLUT strings. This class is instantiated automatically by the engine. Note that this class utilizes deprectated OpenGL functionality.

The available fonts are:

  • GLUT.BITMAP_8_BY_13
  • GLUT.BITMAP_9_BY_15
  • GLUT.BITMAP_TIMES_ROMAN_10
  • GLUT.BITMAP_TIMES_ROMAN_24
  • GLUT.BITMAP_HELVETICA_10
  • GLUT.BITMAP_HELVETICA_12
  • GLUT.BITMAP_HELVETICA_18
Author:
Scott Gordon
